position_1.rationale: #1 sportsbook in US by market share, 4.9/5 app rating from 1.7M reviews, industry leader for Same Game Parlays
position_1.best_for: User experience, SGP variety, mobile interface

position_2.rationale: Extensive NFL markets, MGM Rewards loyalty integration across properties, industry-leading welcome bonus up to $1,500
position_2.best_for: Player props variety, early alt lines, loyalty rewards

position_3.rationale: Appears in all 3 competitor top rankings, 29.9% best NFL underdog prices (highest), widest NFL prop variety in industry
position_3.best_for: Props organization by category, Flash Betting, DFS integration
nfl_specific_features: Most extensive NFL markets in industry
Props grouped by category for easy navigation

position_4.rationale: Best average NFL spread prices per Action Network data, #1 for NFL odds boosts frequency, competitors consistently rank in top tier for NFL
position_4.best_for: Competitive NFL odds, daily odds boosts, VIP rewards program
nfl_specific_features: Live NFL streaming in mobile app
Best spread favorites pricing for NFL
Most daily odds boosts of any sportsbook

position_5.rationale: 46K monthly searches for promo code (highest volume), sharpest NFL lines according to analysis, international reputation for quality
position_5.best_for: Live betting depth, competitive odds, live streaming
nfl_specific_features: Market-leading lines on props and spreads
Responsive app even during NFL Sundays

position_6.rationale: Newest major player gaining market share, unique FanCash rewards system (up to 10% back), NFL streaming capability differentiates from many competitors
position_6.best_for: Loyalty rewards (earn NFL gear), alternative lines, Fair Play Protection
nfl_specific_features: Fair Play Protection (injury refunds on props)
FanCash earned on every NFL wager (up to 10%)

position_7.rationale: ESPN integration provides massive brand reach to casual bettors, unique NFL Power Hour and FanCenter features not available elsewhere, 17K promo code searches monthly
position_7.best_for: Casual bettors, ESPN fantasy integration, BetVision streaming
nfl_specific_features: NFL Power Hour (boosted First TD Scorer odds 1 hour before game)
Injury Insurance for NFL player props
FanCenter links ESPN Fantasy teams for personalized picks
BetVision streaming with live betting on same screen
Better prices than Caesars and DraftKings on NFL lines
position_7.important_note: Rebranding to theScore Bet on December 1, 2025 per Penn Entertainment announcement

key_insights.market_size: Estimated $100 billion wagered on NFL per season in US
key_insights.seasonality: High seasonality - peaks late summer (season start), plateaus during season, spikes during playoffs, drops after Super Bowl
key_insights.market_leaders: FanDuel #1 by market share, DraftKings close second
key_insights.odds_leaders: DraftKings and FanDuel best NFL underdog prices (29.9% and 29.1%), Caesars best spread favorites
key_differentiators: FanDuel: SGP experience and user interface
DraftKings: Props variety and Flash Betting
Caesars: Odds boosts and live streaming
bet365: Sharpest lines and international reputation
Fanatics: Unique FanCash rewards for NFL gear
ESPN BET: Fantasy integration and BetVision
key_insights.line_shopping_importance: Essential for NFL bettors to have multiple accounts due to pricing variations across sportsbooks
